TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, they all explode

I wish Ace would come on steam

Granted, but the Steam servers become sentient and start a robot uprising.

I wish I could do magic. That'd be cool.

Granted. Your magic consists of being able to communicate with snails.

I wish for the power to not be distracted from the forum by another obsession.

granted... your now obsessed with this forum

I wish for NOTHING
Granted. you recieve nothing while everyone else gets food, shelter and love. And wealth. LOTS of wealth.

Granted, 404 not found

I wish for wishes of wish that wish when you wish that you could wish for wishes.

Grant- [ERR]: WISH IS FEEDBACK LOOP. ABORT. ABORT. ABORT.

[WRN]: ASSIGNING AUTOMATIC CORRUPTION OF NaN VALUE. PROCEED (Y/N)? Y

[LOG]: CORRUPTION DESIGNATED: "COSMIC NOTHINGNESS ENTITY BURSTS FROM USER'S FLESH AND PROCEEDS TO TAKE OVER USER'S BODY."

I wish people would not be so silly

Granted but then they pass on their silliness to you.

I wish every color was a rainbow.

Granted, the rainbow factory now need more primary material, and use you.

I wish I was less insane.

Granted, but the decrease is actually a negative value.

I wish for my Eve lander to work.

Granted, but it only works on Jool.

I wish I had a top hat.

granted; you have to deal with magicians constantly grabbing your hair all day

i wish for a rainy day.

Granted, but you drown in a puddle.

I wish I could get a wish that had no harmful effects.

granted. your life is filled with eternal happiness. But how do you know? will you even care? You have no hardships or suffering to define and give value to that happiness to which you so desperately aspire. But at least nothing bad happens to you.

I wnat opotatoe.

Grnatde, uwt?

I wish for more user-friendly forum UI

Granted, but it becomes so user-friendly no one knows how to use it anymore.

I wish people wouldn't hate on the Grammar Nazi'sÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Ã¢â‚¬Â¦

Granted. They are purged and no one hates them ever again...

I wish the Google Picture War thread was unlocked.

granted but ponies

I wish the glass was full instead of half full

Granted, all forums are now broken.

I wish for no pain

Granted, you die a painless death

granted but ponies

I wish the glass was full instead of half full

Granted, you spill all of the glass's liquid onto the carpet

I wish school was easier

granted, nobody learns anything and American society begins to decline.

I wish for Kerbals IRL.

Granted, they crash their rockets everywhere

I wish for Sonic characters IRL

Granted. Every hedgehog and echidna in the world suddenly becomes sentient and set out to exterminate humanity.

I wish I had a greatsword.

Granted, but it's so heavy that it falls on top of your head when you hold it up.

I wish Kerbin City (Build 2) was ready for download.

Granted. Every hedgehog and echidna in the world suddenly becomes sentient and set out to exterminate humanity. *snop*

Well I'd be screwed. But at least I eventually get reborn as one of them.

*snop* I wish Kerbin City (Build 2) was ready for download.

Granted, it's so horribly buggy that the game crashes while the game is still loading

I wish for MOAR PARTS

Granted, all parts are now available in a range of sizes from 1mm upto 100m, in units of 1mm.. You now require 128P of ram to run stock KSP

I wish for a KSP crossover with minecraft!
